display.label: Display
display.placeholder: Add text that should be displayed here...

extent.label: Extent
extent.hint: Specify to which part of the work/image this entry refers to.

href.label: Href
href.hint: Hypertext reference that provides a link to another electronic resource.

refid.label: RefID
refid.hint: ID numbers or codes coming from the local institution or resource named in the source or vocab attributes.

rules.label: Rules
rules.hint: Any data content standards used to construct the value recorded in the element.

source.label: Source
source.hint: The local, print, or electronic source from which the information given in this element derived.

vocab.label: Vocab
vocab.hint: The controlled vocabulary source from which the term or phrase is recorded.

lang.label: Lang
lang.hint: The language used within the element.

script.label: Script
script.hint: The script used within the element.

transliteration.label: Transliteration
transliteration.hint: The transliteration scheme used within the element.

agentSet.label: Agents
agentSet.hint: Add any agents related to the artwork here.

attribution.label: Attribution
attribution.hint: Add, if a work is attributed to a certain artist or school; e.g. "School of".

culture.label: Culture
culture.hint: Add the agent's cultural background here.

type.label: Type
type.hint: If VIAF data is available, value will be set automatically. Otherwise choose a date type.

earliestDate.label: Earliest Date
earliestDate.hint: If VIAF data is available, value will be set automatically. If not, add e.g. the year of birth or start of activity here.

type.label: Uncertain
type.hint: Use terms from the drop-down list, if the Earliest Date is not verified.

latestDate.label: Latest Date
latestDate.hint: If VIAF data is available, value will be set automatically. If not, add e.g. the year of death or the end of activity here.

type.label: Uncertain
type.hint: Use terms from the drop-down list, if the latest date is not verified.

name.label: Name
name.hint: Start entering the last name of a person and select the right agent from the suggestions (VIAF).

type.label: Name Type
type.hint: If VIAF data available, value will be set automatically. If not, choose a name type from the drop-down list.

exactSearch.label: Exact Search
exactSearch.hint: Searches for the precise name only, e.g. "gogh, vincent van" or "metropolitan museum of art".

role.label: Role
role.hint: Choose a role from the drop-down list (MARC relator terms).

culturalContextSet.label: Cultural Context(s)
culturalContextSet.hint: Enter the cultural context of the artwork here.

culturalContext.label: Cultural Context
culturalContext.hint: Add the culture from which the artwork originates here.

dateSet.label: Dates
dateSet.hint: Add any dates related to the artwork here, the creation date in particular.

type.label: Type
type.hint: Use terms from the drop-down list to describe the type of date.

date.label: Earliest Date
date.hint: Please use the YYYY-MM-DD format to add a date.

type.label: Uncertain
type.hint: Use terms from the drop-down list, if the Earliest Date is not certain.

alternativeNotation.label: Alternative Notation
alternativeNotation.hint: Can be used to add date formats other than the western, e.g. using the notation of Chinese reigns or the Islamic calendar.

type.label: Type
type.hint: Use terms from the drop-down list, if the date is not verified.

date.label: Latest Date
date.hint: Please use the YYYY-MM-DD format to add a date.

type.label: Uncertain
type.hint: Use terms from the drop-down list, if the date is not verified.

alternativeNotation.label: AlternativeNotation
alternativeNotation.hint: Can be used to add date formats other than the western, e.g. using the notation of Chinese reigns or the Islamic calendar.

type.label: Uncertain
type.hint: Use terms from the drop-down list, if the date is not verified.

type.label: Type
type.hint: You may mark this description with the special type "State of Preservation" here.

text.label: Text
text.hint: Include a description of the work or image here.

type.label: Name Type
type.hint: If VIAF data available, value will be set automatically. If not, choose a name type from the drop-down list.

name.label: Name
name.hint: Start entering the last name of the person who wrote the description (VIAF).

role.label: Role
role.hint: Choose a role from the drop-down list (MARC relator terms).

author.label: Author
author.hint: Start entering the last name of the person who inscribed the artwork and select the right person from the suggestions (VIAF) - or add a new entry.

position.label: Position
position.hint: Specify the position of the inscription on the artwork.

type.label: Type
type.hint: Use terms from the drop-down list to specify what kind of inscription you are adding.

text.label: Text
text.hint: Add the text of the inscription here.
text.placeholder: Add the text of the inscription here...

locationSet.label: Locations
locationSet.hint: You may enter any location associated with the artwork here, e.g. repository, site of discovery or exhibition.

type.label: Type
type.hint: Choose a location type from the drop-down list.

type.label: Type
type.hint: Specify the RefID type.

refid.label: Refid
refid.hint: Use this field to add the accession or catalogue number when you are adding a (former) repository or exhibition.

type.label: Type
type.hint: Specify the name type.

name.label: Name
name.hint: Start entering the name of the location and select the right term from the suggestions (TGN/VIAF) or add a new entry.

epsg.label: EPSG
epsg.hint: Enter the EPSG code of the Coordinate Reference Systems here, e.g. 4326 for WGS 84 (Wikipedia) or 3857 for Google Mercator (Google Maps).

lat.label: Lat
lat.hint: You may also add geographical coordinates to specify the location.

long.label: Long
long.hint: You may also add geographical coordinates to specify the location.

type.label: Type
type.hint: Select the type of the material you are adding from the drop-down list.

material.label: Material
material.hint: Start entering a material term and select the right term from the suggestions (AAT) or add a new entry.

measurementsSet.label: Measurements
measurementsSet.hint: Add the measurements of the artwork here. Use a new entry for every single measure you add, and choose its type and the shape of the artwork from the drop-down lists.

type.label: Type
type.hint: Select the type of the measurements you are adding from the drop-down list.

measurements.label: Measurement
measurements.hint: Add the measurement value here. Use a new entry for every single measure you add, and choose its type and the shape of the artwork from the drop-down lists.

type.label: Type
type.hint: Select the type of the relation from the drop-down list.

type.label: Type
type.hint: Please choose a copyright status from the drop-down list.

rightsHolder.label: RightsHolder
rightsHolder.hint: Please enter the name of the rightsholder, e.g. a Museum, a person's name, here.

type.label: Type
type.hint: Please choose a RefID type from the drop-down list.

refid.label: Refid
refid.hint: Choose a referential ID type from the drop-down list and enter the ID accordingly, e.g. an ISBN.

type.label: Type
type.hint: Please choose a source type from the drop-down list.

name.label: Name
name.hint: Enter the name of the source in the text field.

type.label: Type
type.hint: Choose a state or edition type from the drop-down list.

num.label: Number
num.hint: Please enter the state or edition number here.

count.label: Count
count.hint: Please enter the number of known states or editions here.

name.label: Name
name.hint: Add a descriptive name of the state or edition here; e.g. 1st state or Edition of 1564.

description.label: Description
description.hint: Add aditional information on the state/edition of the artwork here that you could not enter elsewhere.

stylePeriod.label: StylePeriod
stylePeriod.hint: Start entering a style or period and select the right style or period from the suggestions (AAT) or add a new entry.

type.label: Type
type.hint: Select the type of the subject you are adding from the drop-down list.

term.label: Term
term.hint: Start entering a subject term and select the right term from the suggestions (AAT) or add a new entry.

technique.label: Technique
technique.hint: Start entering a technique and select the right term from the suggestions (AAT) or add a new entry.

name.label: Name
name.hint: Enter the name of the textual reference here.

type.label: Type
type.hint: Select what kind of textual reference you are adding from the drop-down list.

refid.label: Refid
refid.hint: Choose a referential ID type from the drop-down list and enter the ID accordingly, e.g. an ISBN.

type.label: Type
type.hint: type

type.label: Type
type.hint: Select what kind of title you are adding from the drop-down list.

title.label: Title
title.hint: Enter the title of the artwork here.

worktype.label: Worktype
worktype.hint: Start entering a worktype and select the right term from the suggestions (AAT) or add a new entry.
